parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing rule to update.

parameters.name: Tiering
parameters.description: The set of tiering configurations for the pricing rule. The possible Amazon Web Services Free Tier configurations. Activate or deactivate application of Amazon Web Services Free Tier.

nested_params.name: FreeTier
nested_params.description: The possible Amazon Web Services Free Tier configurations.

nested_params.name: Activated
nested_params.description: Activate or deactivate application of Amazon Web Services Free Tier.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the successfully updated pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The new name of the pricing rule. The name must be unique to each pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The new description for the pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: The scope of pricing rule that indicates if it's globally applicable, or it's service-specific.

nested_items.name: ModifierPercentage
nested_items.description: The new modifier to show pricing plan rates as a percentage.

nested_items.name: Service
nested_items.description: If the Scope attribute is set to SERVICE, the attribute indicates which service the PricingRule is applicable for.

nested_items.name: AssociatedPricingPlanCount
nested_items.description: The pricing plans count that this pricing rule is associated with.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time the pricing rule was modified.

nested_items.name: BillingEntity
nested_items.description: The seller of services provided by Amazon Web Services, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via Amazon Web Services Marketplace.

nested_items.name: Activated
nested_items.description: Activate or deactivate application of Amazon Web Services Free Tier.

nested_items.name: UsageType
nested_items.description: Usage type is the unit that each service uses to measure the usage of a specific type of resource.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: Operation refers to the specific Amazon Web Services covered by this line item. This describes the specific usage of the line item.
